"A.P.241/9/27 10:00":
"Hmm, it was more disorderly than
I expected."

"It's true. There was too much
illogical nonsense, from
Summoning to Magic."

"In any case, I don't think that Omega
reflects the history of our world.
Their clothes and technology don't
match anything in our records."

"There's an overwhelming abundance of
information, and it's very confusing.
However, there seems to be two
important matters that we care about."

"First, you can come and go from
Omega."
"Second, we can send people to Omega."

"Thanks to the cooperation of
everyone, we'll be able to send more
people there. Albeit in limited
quantities."

"I wonder if there's people who are
similar to your wavelengths.
Perhaps the third generation...?"

"Even with the third generation,
we'd still be limited on who could
go in. It'd take some work."

"Beyond this world...
I'll leave the decision making
within Omega to you."

"Helping that girl, Harriet, would
be a great way to get to know the
world of Omega. And for a Guardian,
it's not too bad of an idea either."

"In that case, our goal is to help
Harriet and her kingdom against the
various Devil Castles."

"With that, our analysis of the
Buster Towers was perfect. If we're
able to emulate them on site, we
should be able to make perfect copies
of them!"
